= openMDX SDK 2.7 Deploy on JBoss =
(Contribution by zdenekhrib)

This guide explains how to deploy the openMDX examples on JBoss.

Let's assume that you want to deploy the openMDX !HelloWorld example in the the "default" server profile.

Steps before starting JBoss (order not important):
 * Copy ''openmdx-helloworld.ear'' into ''jboss\server\default\deploy'' (actually I am using the archive-unpacked-into-dir way)
 * Create ''defaultUsers.properties'' in ''jboss\server\default\conf'' containing line: ''guest=guest''
 * Create ''defaultRoles.properties'' in ''jboss\server\default\conf'' containing line: ''guest=openMDXUser''
 * Copy ''openjpa-1.2.1.jar'', ''openmdx-base.jar'' and ''openmdx-system.jar'' into ''jboss\server\default\lib''
 * Add the following lines to ''jboss\bin\run.conf.bat'':

{{{ 
rem Setup openMDX-specific properties
set JAVA_OPTS=%JAVA_OPTS% -Dorg.openmdx.compatibility.base.application.j2ee.domain=apps
set JAVA_OPTS=%JAVA_OPTS% -Dorg.openmdx.compatibility.base.application.j2ee.server=server1
set JAVA_OPTS=%JAVA_OPTS% -Djava.protocol.handler.pkgs=org.openmdx.kernel.url.protocol
set JAVA_OPTS=%JAVA_OPTS% -Dorg.openmdx.log.config.filename=d:\jboss-5.1.0.GA\server\default\server.log.properties
}}}
